channel.title: How do i run a 525?
channel.description:
idk how to make a client for a 508 i tried jc failed
idk how to use 525 ip changger http://files.filefront.com/Dragonscape+525zip/;13779948;/fileinfo.html

item.title: How do i run a 525?
item.dc:creator: @propaganda propaganda
item.description:
@propaganda wrote:

i find that using the jc-scape older version 525 is difficult to run
you must change the insctructions of the rune.bat
and the supposedly “newer” version is a leech of shards revolution
i suggest using a different source, like w00tsc4p3
or mine, which i will release soon

to run a 525 other that jc all you need to do is open run.bat
you must have a 525 client
or a 525 chace and replace the 508 cache in ur 508 client
and for ip
in a 525 client
(dragonscape) find servers.txt
open it
and delete the first line of text
if its empty, dont worry, then all you need to do is

  1. if you’re running your own server type 127.0.0.1:43594
    or type 0.0.0.0:43594 or 127.0.01:5555 or 0.0.0.0:555
    or if you have no-ip use that and ie example.no-ip.biz:43594 or what ever port you’re running your no-ip on

  2. running someone else’s server open servers.txt and replace the first line with their no-ip or ip address followed by :43594 or :5555 or what ever port their using (only 43594 and 5555 are trusted ports)
    then save. REMEMBER! only one server ip per line or it wont work

HOPE THIS HELPS

Read full topic

item.title: How do i run a 525?
item.dc:creator: @tehlobbiescape tehlobbiescape
item.description:
@tehlobbiescape wrote:

Do you have Jdk? if not download it, do you have your enviromental variables set?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 20, 2009, 08:24:57 pm[/size][hr]Ugg forget my post idk how to eaither, i downloaded 525 also and idk how to use, im used to 508
